name: Harmless Form
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Heroes of the Street © 2015, Paizo Inc.
target: one willing animal companion, familiar, or spirit animal
text: You transform the target into a harmless animal of the same approximate body type. The form assumed must be one considered unobtrusive by local communities, such as a cat, a dog, a hunting hawk, a horse, or a rat. This transformation can reduce the target by up to two size categories, but cannot make an animal smaller than Tiny. It cannot increase the size of the target or give it new natural attacks or new forms of movement. The spell otherwise functions as beast shape II.
target_zh: 一个自愿的动物伙伴、魔宠或魂兽
text_zh: 妳将目标转化成身形大致相同的无害动物。这伪装的型态必须是一种在当地社群被认为是不引人注目的，像是一只猫、狗、猎鹰、一匹马或一只老鼠。这转化可以降低目标至多两阶段的体型，但不能让该动物比超小型(Tiny)还小。此法术不能增加目标的体型，也不会给它天生武器攻击。也不会给予新型态的行动能力(movement)。此法术在其他方面如同野兽型态II(beast shape II)般作用。
